alert.note: Alert for Camp; Cass; Marion; Morris; Titus; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 11:17PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN MARION... SOUTHWESTERN CASS...NORTHEASTERN UPSHUR...SOUTHERN MORRIS... SOUTHEASTERN TITUS AND CENTRAL CAMP COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pittsburg to 10 miles west of Cedar Springs to near Gilmer. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Gilmer, Pittsburg, Daingerfield, Hughes Springs, Lone Star, Ore City, Cason, Jenkins, Cedar Springs, Avinger, Midway, Holly Springs, Harvard, Lafayette, Center Point, and Bettie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Camp; Cass; Marion; Morris; Titus; Upshur
